title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models & conversations in browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API & Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed requests & streaming responses.

title: ollama-copilot-vscode
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that chats and generates images using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, docs, or commit messages via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-chatbot-react
summary: Minimal React chatbot starter that talks to Ollama over fetch-stream.

title: ollama-cli-tools
summary: Shell scripts to bulk pull, tag, and convert models for Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing LLM outputs.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and delete models.
